name: provinciality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact or quality of being provincial (= in or from the parts of a country that are not the capital city): In subsequent centuries the city faded into provinciality. The covered market is a good place to sample the town's cheery provinciality.
the fact or quality of being provincial (= only interested in your own country or region): This country has a long tradition of provinciality and not being very interested in foreign culture. We must get rid of our provinciality of outlook. Synonym
parochialism
More examplesFewer examplesFollowing the rebellion, the city sank into provinciality.
